title: Where to buy Trade Gothic Medium?
content: I have some indesign files (created on a Mac) that I'm trying to edit on a PC. I have trade gothic ST installed, but not the medium weight. Is it possible to buy anywhere? I can't find any mention of trade gothic medium on adobe or linotype.
author: dafonz

comments.content:
Unless it is a modified weight of the family, what you are most likely looking for is the Regular weight of Trade Gothic. Some older Postscript versions of the Regular weight use Medium as the weight specification for the Regular weight. The screen shots below show the differing name information in the Adobe Mac PS Type 1 and OpenType PS versions of Trade Gothic:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830050612im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Trade%20Gothic%20(PS)_5635.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830050612im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Trade%20Gothic%20LT%20Std%20(OT)_5343.jpg)
Arg - that's what it was. Thank you for saving me from countless hours of searching
